item.title: Trpk is back!
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Terrible server.
Veterans think they own server and wont help. Just trying to get profit out of new players.
Barrows items does not have their specials against NPC.
Noclipping is joke.

Why bring this up again if it is clearly not ready?

Read full topic
